definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
rubric (i.e. a guide listing specific criteria for grading)

sentences.english: Wen Yiduo ever sang highly of Liu's creation.
sentences.chinese: 闻一多曾高度评价过他的诗歌创作。

sentences.english: CIPP evaluation pattern makes strong influence in the world.
sentences.chinese: CIPP是一种在国内外影响较大的课程评价模式。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the sustained release effect of Huangyangning Sustained-Released Tablets (HSRT).
sentences.chinese: 目的评价黄杨宁缓释片的缓释效果。

sentences.english: Objective To further discuss the indexes which can be used to objectively appraise the rat myocardial ischemia models.
sentences.chinese: 目的进一步探讨客观评价大鼠心肌缺血模型的指标。

sentences.english: Objectives To study the baroreflex function in patients with vasovagal syncope.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价血管迷走性晕厥患者的压力反射器功能。

sentences.english: Sheldon: You know, I think I may have misjudged this restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我想我给这家餐厅的评价错了。

sentences.english: Jiangsu building work accomplished thus gave high evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 对江苏建设工作，汪光焘给予了高度评价。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnostic value of diaphragm activity range to foreign body transmitted X-rays in bronchus.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价横膈动度对透X线性支气管异物的诊断价值。

sentences.english: The feasibility of applying fuzzy mathematics method to appraise manuscript quality is studied. How to apply Method No.
sentences.chinese: 探讨应用模糊数学方法评价论文稿质量的可行性。

sentences.english: Objective To assess and design of internal quality control procedures of the coagulation test.
sentences.chinese: 目的对凝血试验试验项目的质控方法进行评价和设计。

sentences.english: The fair and impartial evaluation, also penetrating the.
sentences.chinese: 这些评价非常中肯，也都入木三分的。

sentences.english: We used a funnel plot to evaluate reports for publication bias.
sentences.chinese: 我们使用倒漏斗图形对出版偏倚的报道进行评价。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of echocardiography in tricuspid valve lesions (TVL).
sentences.chinese: 目的评价超声心动图对三尖瓣病变的诊断价值。

sentences.english: The single value rating methods for sound insulation of a partition are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论建筑构件隔声性能单值评价方法。

sentences.english: Objective Evaluate the effect of removable die(RD) on the marginal fidelity of the metal full crown.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价活动代型对金属全冠邻面边缘适合性的影响。

definition: to praise/to approve of/to show approval
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
to comment/a point by point commentary
way of looking at a thing/view/opinion/CL:個|个[ge4]
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
